content:
From: David Blubaugh via Cl-isabelle-users <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
I launched a new project on Hackaday.io.   It is in the use of the Isabelle HOL to verify and validate the DOOM source code from ID software.   

I was wondering if users on this mailing list could review the project and please give me some feedback ??  
DOOM SOURCE CODE - SOFTWARE ARCHAEOLOGY- ISABELLE

DOOM SOURCE CODE - SOFTWARE ARCHAEOLOGY- ISABELLE

Doom Video Game Source code being analyzed by the Isabelle HOL automated theorem prover. This is done to help de...

David Blubaugh
